column3: Code review ACK f6f0d789c52dbb1d3a447a3b7e315249a2a292ce\n\nI would suggest calling it something else than a 'refactor' in the commit and PR description as it intentionally changes the functionality of the code.

> Code review ACK [f6f0d78](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/f6f0d789c52dbb1d3a447a3b7e315249a2a292ce)
> 
> I would suggest calling it something else than a 'refactor' in the commit and PR description as it intentionally changes the functionality of the code.

Now PR and commit use the keyword `log`
